upcomingEvents.label: Events
upcomingEvents.title: Upcoming Events
upcomingEvents.description: Economic events timeline coming soon. View and track upcoming high-impact events directly from your clock sidebar.

sidebar.title: Session Overview
sidebar.description: Your market clock provides a real-time view of active trading sessions, upcoming economic events, and session overlaps — all in one place.

dualCircle.title: Dual-Circle Design
dualCircle.body: The inner ring shows AM sessions (pre-market, London open), the outer ring shows PM sessions (NY afternoon, Asia). Overlapping arcs reveal when markets trade simultaneously.

sessionArcs.title: Session Arcs
sessionArcs.body: Each colored arc represents a trading session. The active session fills with a progress indicator so you can see at a glance how far through the session you are.

eventMarkers.title: Event Markers
eventMarkers.body: Small dots on the clock face mark upcoming economic releases. High-impact events appear bolder so you never miss a key data point.

sessionLabel.title: Session Label
sessionLabel.body: The chip above shows the currently active session and a live countdown to its close — or the next session and when it opens.

filters.title: Filters
filters.body: Use the currency and impact filters to control which event markers appear on the clock and in the Events tab.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.body: Tap the timezone button below the clock to switch between your local time, New York, London, or any supported timezone.

tip.title: Pro Tip
tip.body: Tap any session arc to see its exact open/close times. Use the gear icon in the navigation bar to customize colors, toggle elements, and sync settings across devices.
